sentences.chinese: 树根

sentences.chinese: 我刚报道完柬埔寨战争回来。

sentences.english: Spinach and eggplant.
sentences.chinese: 菠菜和茄子。

sentences.english: I said, "it is eggplant, olives and tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 我说， “这是茄子，橄榄和西红柿。

sentences.english: However, eggplant and capsicums should be stored open in the crisper as they sweat if stored in plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 而茄子和辣椒应该敞开存放在新鲜蔬菜保存盒中，因为当它们存放在塑料袋里时会冒汗。

detailed_translations.english: a large vegetable with smooth purple skin

name: shake
trans: vt. 动摇；摇动；震动；握手

sentences.english: She shook him to wake him up.
sentences.chinese: 她摇摇他，想把他叫醒。

sentences.english: Shake the bottle before you open it.
sentences.chinese: 打开瓶子之前先摇一摇。

sentences.english: The whole house started to shake.
sentences.chinese: 整幢房子摇晃起来。

sentences.english: The car shook as it went over a bump.
sentences.chinese: 汽车驶过一个隆起的地方时颠了一下。

sentences.english: The little boy’s hand was shaking.
sentences.chinese: 这小男孩的手在发抖。

sentences.english: Give the bottle a good shake before use.
sentences.chinese: 使用前要用力摇晃瓶子

sentences.english: His confidence was badly shaken.
sentences.chinese: 他的自信心受到很大的打击。

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly from side to side or up and down, usually with a lot of force, or to make something or someone do this
if you give something a shake, you move it up and down or from side to side

name: flap
trans: n. 拍打，拍打声；神经紧张；[航] 襟翼
vt. 拍打；扔；拉下帽边；飘动
vi. 拍动；神经紧张；鼓翼而飞；（帽边等）垂下

sentences.english: The flags were flapping in the breeze.
sentences.chinese: 旗帜在微风中飘扬。

detailed_translations.chinese: 飘动， 拍动； 振翅
detailed_translations.english: if a bird flaps its wings, it moves them up and down in order to fly

detailed_translations.chinese: 片状垂悬物；飘动，摆动，振动；激动，慌忙状态
detailed_translations.english: a thin flat piece of cloth, paper, skin etc that is fixed by one edge to a surface, which you can lift up easily
to move quickly up and down or from side to side, often making a noise

name: avoid
trans: vt. 避免；避开，躲避；消除

sentences.english: Road safety is taught to young children to avoid road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子受到道路安全知识的教育，以避免交通事故。

sentences.english: It is important to take measures to avoid the risk of fire.
sentences.chinese: 采取措施避免火灾风险很重要。

sentences.english: Alan narrowly avoided an accident.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦险出事故。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something bad from happening

sentences.english: Danger! No boats beyond this point.
sentences.chinese: 危险！船只不可越过此处。

sentences.english: The refugees believe that their lives are in danger .
sentences.chinese: 难民认为他们有生命危险。

detailed_translations.english: the possibility that someone or something will be harmed, destroyed, or killed

sentences.english: laws about dangerous dogs
sentences.chinese: 有关危险犬类的法律

sentences.english: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.english: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.chinese: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

detailed_translations.english: able or likely to harm or kill you

sentences.english: Her illness was caused mainly by stress.
sentences.chinese: 她的病主要是由精神压力引起的。

sentences.english: The workforce is mainly made up of women.
sentences.chinese: 员工主要是女性。

sentences.english: I don’t go out much, mainly because I have to look after the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我不大出去，主要是因为我得照看孩子们。

sentences.english: Increased sales during the summer were mainly due to tourism.
sentences.chinese: 夏季销售额增加主要是由旅游业带动的。

sentences.english: We talked about various things – work, mainly.
sentences.chinese: 我们谈了各种各样的事情——主要是谈工作。

detailed_translations.english: used to mention the main part or cause of something, the main reason for something etc

name: bamboo
trans: adj. 竹制的；土著居民的

sentences.english: Everything there is made of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 那里什么都是竹子做的。

sentences.english: Do you like bamboo?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢竹子吗?

detailed_translations.english: a tall tropical plant with hollow stems that is used for making furniture

sentences.english: I/ you/ we/ they like giraffe.
sentences.chinese: 我/你/我们/他们喜欢长颈鹿。

sentences.english: So they sent me a … giraffe!
sentences.chinese: 于是他们又送我一只…长颈鹿。

sentences.english: Can I get the mommy giraffe for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 我在圣诞节能得到一个长颈鹿妈妈吗？

detailed_translations.english: a tall African animal with a very long neck and legs and dark spots on its yellow-brown fur

name: escape
trans: n. 逃跑；逃亡；逃走；逃跑工具或方法；野生种；泄漏
vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走；（气体，液体等）漏出；（未受伤或只受了一点伤害而）逃脱；声音（不自觉地）由…发出
vt. 逃避，避开，避免；被忘掉；被忽视

sentences.english: He broke down the locked door and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他砸开上锁的门，逃走了。

sentences.english: Vents allow any steam to escape if the system overheats.
sentences.chinese: 如果系统过热，排放口可使蒸汽逸出。

sentences.english: The girl had no chance of escape.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩没有机会逃跑。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a place when someone is trying to catch you or stop you, or when there is a dangerous situation
the act of getting away from a place, or a dangerous or bad situation

name: fierce
trans: adj. 凶猛的；猛烈的；暴躁的

sentences.english: fierce guard dogs
sentences.chinese: 凶猛的看门狗

sentences.english: fierce fighting in the city
sentences.chinese: 城里的激烈战斗

detailed_translations.english: a fierce person or animal is angry or ready to attack, and looks very frightening

sentences.english: Are we doing enough to protect the environment?
sentences.chinese: 我们在保护环境方面做得够吗？

detailed_translations.english: to keep someone or something safe from harm, damage, or illness

sentences.english: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
sentences.chinese: 她竟然那么傻，以为他会留下来。

sentences.english: Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
sentences.chinese: 我像个傻子，立刻就接受了。

sentences.english: You silly old fool !
sentences.chinese: 你这个大傻瓜！

sentences.english: Even art experts were fooled.
sentences.chinese: 连艺术品专家也被骗了。

detailed_translations.english: a stupid person or someone who has done something stupid
to trick someone into believing something that is not true

name: century
trans: n. 世纪，百年；（板球）一百分

sentences.english: the story of life on a small farm at the turn of the century
sentences.chinese: 讲述世纪初一个小农场生活的故事

detailed_translations.english: one of the 100-year periods measured from before or after the year of Christ’s birth

name: fur
trans: vt. 用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装

sentences.english: a fur coat
sentences.chinese: 裘皮大衣

detailed_translations.english: the thick soft hair that covers the bodies of some animals, such as cats, dogs, and rabbits

detailed_translations.chinese: 用毛皮覆盖；使穿毛皮服装

sentences.english: The symbol on the packet is a guarantee that the food has been produced organically.
sentences.chinese: 包装盒上的这个标识保证这种食物是有机生产的。

sentences.english: Fe is the chemical symbol for iron.
sentences.chinese: Fe是铁的化学符号。

detailed_translations.english: a picture or shape that has a particular meaning or represents a particular organization or idea

sentences.english: Sue showed great courage throughout her illness.
sentences.chinese: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.english: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .
sentences.chinese: 他出事故后再驾车肯定需要很大的勇气。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being brave when you are facing a difficult or dangerous situation or when you are very ill

sentences.english: brave soldiers
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的士兵

sentences.english: her brave fight against cancer
sentences.chinese: 她与癌症的勇敢搏斗

detailed_translations.english: dealing with danger, pain, or difficult situations with courage and confidence
to deal with a difficult, dangerous, or unpleasant situation
a young fighting man from a Native American tribe

name: chain
trans: vt. 束缚；囚禁；用铁链锁住

sentences.english: ...a large supermarket chain.
sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

name: balance
trans: vt. 使平衡；结算；使相称
vi. 保持平衡；相称；抵销

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something
to form a particular judgment about a situation after carefully considering the facts

name: disappear
trans: vi. 消失；失踪；不复存在

sentences.english: At this point the path seemed to disappear altogether (= disappear completely ) .
sentences.chinese: 小路到这里好像完全消失了。

sentences.english: The two girls disappeared while walking home from school..
sentences.chinese: 这两名女孩在放学回家的路上失踪了。

detailed_translations.english: to become impossible to see any longer

name: kill
trans: vt. 杀死；扼杀；使终止；抵消

sentences.english: Why did she kill her husband?
sentences.chinese: 她为什么杀死丈夫？

sentences.english: Murray held a gun to his head and threatened to kill him.
sentences.chinese: 默里拿枪指着他的头并威胁要杀了他。

sentences.english: Four people were killed when a train plunged into a flooded river.
sentences.chinese: 火车冲进洪水泛滥的河中，造成四人身亡。

sentences.english: Bleach kills household germs.
sentences.chinese: 漂白剂能够杀灭日常病菌。

sentences.english: Smoking kills.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会致人死亡。

sentences.english: The out-of-town shopping centre will kill local trade.
sentences.chinese: 城外的购物中心将令本地商业难以为继。

sentences.english: With time to kill, he took a cab to the centre.
sentences.chinese: 还有点时间可以消磨，于是他叫了一辆出租车去市中心。

detailed_translations.english: to make a person or animal die

name: cut
trans: n. 伤口；切口；削减；（服装等的）式样；削球；切入
adj. 割下的；雕过的；缩减的
vt. [机] 切割；削减；缩短；刺痛
vi. [机] 切割；相交；切牌；停拍；不出席

sentences.english: Do you want me to cut the cake?
sentences.chinese: 要我切蛋糕吗？

sentences.english: They’re introducing CCTV cameras in an attempt to cut street crime in the area.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少该地区的街头犯罪，他们安装了闭路电视摄像机。

sentences.english: You need to cut the amount of fat and sugar in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你需要减少饮食中脂肪和糖的摄入量。

sentences.english: Scientists are warning that unless carbon emissions are cut, we could be heading for an environmental catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 科学家警告说如果不减少碳排放量，我们可能会面临环境灾难。

sentences.english: Seven hundred jobs will be lost in order to cut costs and boost profits.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低成本，提高利润，将削减700个职位。

sentences.english: The major aviation companies need to cut prices if they are to compete with budget airlines.
sentences.chinese: 大航空公司如果想和廉价的航空公司竞争，就需要降低价格。

sentences.english: Staffing levels had already been cut to the bone (= reduced to the lowest level possible ) .
sentences.chinese: 人员配备已经削减到了最低限度。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something or separate something from its main part, using scissors, a knife etc

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

sentences.english: her close friendship with her aunt
sentences.chinese: 她与姑母的亲密友谊

sentences.english: a lifelong friendship
sentences.chinese: 一生的友谊

sentences.english: The two boys formed a deep and lasting friendship .
sentences.chinese: 这两个男孩子建立了深厚持久的友谊。

sentences.english: I could always rely on Gary for friendship and support.
sentences.chinese: 我总是可以依靠加里的友情和支持。

detailed_translations.english: a relationship between friends

sentences.english: But critics and environmental groups say poaching is still on the rise in Zimbabwe, especially of the black rhino.
sentences.chinese: 但批评家和环境保护组织认为，偷猎在津巴布韦依然有增无减，尤其是狩猎黑犀牛。

detailed_translations.english: a rhinoceros

sentences.english: She had thick black hair and smooth dark skin.
sentences.chinese: 她一头浓密的黑发，皮肤黝黑光滑。

sentences.english: The skin on his hands was dry and rough.
sentences.chinese: 他手上的皮肤干燥粗糙。

detailed_translations.english: the natural outer layer of a person’s or animal’s body
to remove the skin from an animal, fruit, or vegetable

name: warn
trans: vi. 发出警告，发出预告

sentences.english: ‘Be careful, the rocks are slippery,’ Alex warned.
sentences.chinese: “小心，岩石很滑。”亚历克斯提醒说。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something bad or dangerous may happen, so that they can avoid it or prevent it

sentences.english: an insect bite
sentences.chinese: 昆虫的叮咬

sentences.english: flying insects
sentences.chinese: 飞虫

sentences.english: Don’t forget to bring insect repellant (= a chemical to keep insects away ).
sentences.chinese: 不要忘记带上驱虫剂。

detailed_translations.english: a small creature such as a fly or ant, that has six legs, and sometimes wings

sentences.english: I have quite a good relationship with my parents.
sentences.chinese: 我和父母关系很好。

sentences.english: the relationship between diet and health problems
sentences.chinese: 膳食与健康问题之间的联系

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people or two groups feel about each other and behave towards each other

name: survive
trans: vt. 幸存；生还；幸免于；比...活得长

sentences.english: Only 12 of the 140 passengers survived.
sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.english: She survived the attack.
sentences.chinese: 她在袭击中幸免于难。

sentences.english: people who survive cancer
sentences.chinese: 癌症幸存者

detailed_translations.chinese: 活下来，继续存在；幸免于
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live after an accident, war, or illness

detailed_translations.chinese: 从中挺过来； 从…逃出； 比…活得长
detailed_translations.english: to continue to live normally in spite of many problems

sentences.english: This photo of a hippo at Disney World has absolutely nothing to do with this post and only serves to confuse things.
sentences.chinese: 这张迪斯尼世界河马照片绝对与本文章毫无关联，放这里只会让你莫名其妙。

sentences.english: "One thing we know about the Herto people, they had a taste for meat, especially hippos, " White said, brushing some sand off a hippo skull.
sentences.chinese: “我们知道赫托人已经开始吃肉了，尤其是河马肉，”怀特一边说着，一边将一具河马头骨上的沙土拭去。

sentences.english: Described as one of the most aggressive creatures in the animal kingdom, an adult hippo can apply several tons of pressure in a single bite.
sentences.chinese: 成年河马是动物王国里最有攻击力的家伙之一，它一嘴咬下来的压力就能有好几吨。

detailed_translations.english: a hippopotamus

name: tortoise
trans: n. 龟，[脊椎] 乌龟（等于testudo）；迟缓的人

sentences.english: I saw a big sea tortoise .
sentences.chinese: 我看见过一个大海龟。

sentences.english: Run like a tortoise.
sentences.chinese: 像乌龟一样慢慢跑。

sentences.english: Either way, both the hare and tortoise get what they deserve based on how they behave.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，野兔和乌龟得到什么都是基于它们的行为举止的。

detailed_translations.english: a slow-moving land animal that can pull its head and legs into the hard round shell that covers its body

name: truly
trans: adv. 真实地，不假；真诚地

sentences.english: His work is truly original.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品确实十分独特。

sentences.english: Fawcett was a truly remarkable man.
sentences.chinese: 福西特是一位真正不同凡响的人。

sentences.english: a truly great work of medieval literature
sentences.chinese: 一部真正伟大的中世纪文学作品

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that the way you are describing something is really true

sentences.english: National boundaries are becoming increasingly meaningless in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 在全球经济中，国界已经变得越来越没有意义。

sentences.english: We would need their agreement to build outside the city boundary .
sentences.chinese: 我们在市界以外的地方建房需要他们批准。

sentences.english: The stream curves round to mark the boundary of his property.
sentences.chinese: 小河打了个弯，为他这块地划出了边界。

sentences.english: Anything that crosses the boundary of a black hole cannot get back.
sentences.chinese: 任何物质只要跨越黑洞的界线就再也无法出来。

sentences.english: We walked through the churchyard towards the boundary wall .
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过教堂墓地，向院墙走去。

sentences.english: The property’s boundary line is 25 feet from the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这块地产的边界线在屋后25英尺的地方。

sentences.english: boundary disputes between neighbouring countries
sentences.chinese: 邻国之间的边界争端

detailed_translations.english: the real or imaginary line that marks the edge of a state, country etc, or the edge of an area of land that belongs to someone

sentences.english: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.english: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.chinese: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.english: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.chinese: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.english: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工艺学； 工艺， 技术
detailed_translations.english: new machines, equipment, and ways of doing things that are based on modern knowledge about science and computers

sentences.english: We have stopped making desktops because no one is making money from them.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经停止生产台式电脑了，因为不赚钱。

detailed_translations.english: the main area on a computer where you can find the  icon s  that represent programs, and where you can do things to manage the information on the computer

name: tablet
trans: n. 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
vt. 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

sentences.english: She took a couple of headache tablets .
sentences.chinese: 她吃了几片头痛药。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碑；药片；写字板；小块；平板电脑
detailed_translations.english: a small round hard piece of medicine which you swallow

detailed_translations.chinese: 用碑牌纪念；将(备忘录等)写在板上；将…制成小片或小块

name: keyboard
trans: vt. 键入；用键盘式排字机排字
vi. 用键盘进行操作；作键盘式排字机排字

sentences.english: a computer keyboard
sentences.chinese: 计算机键盘

detailed_translations.english: a board with buttons marked with letters or numbers that are pressed to put information into a computer or other machine

detailed_translations.chinese: 键入；用键盘式排字机排字
detailed_translations.english: to put information into a computer, using a keyboard

name: invitation
trans: n. 邀请；引诱；请帖；邀请函

sentences.english: an invitation to speak at a scientific conference
sentences.chinese: 在科学大会上发言的邀请

sentences.english: We sent out more than 300 wedding invitations.
sentences.chinese: 我们发出了超过300份婚礼请柬。

detailed_translations.english: a written or spoken request to someone, inviting them to go somewhere or do something

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.chinese: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.

sentences.english: Bruce is thinking of applying for the position.

sentences.chinese: 他甚至没有过来向我祝贺。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are happy because they have achieved something or because something nice has happened to them

sentences.english: The price is £25.50, including postage and packing.
sentences.chinese: 价钱是25.5英镑，含邮费和包装费。

sentences.chinese: 你将需要各种技巧，包括领导能力和协商能力。

name: account
trans: n. 账户；解释；账目，账单；理由；描述

sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

name: husband
trans: vt. 节约地使用（或管理）

sentences.english: Have you met my husband Roy?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的丈夫罗伊吗？

detailed_translations.english: the man that a woman is married to

sentences.english: We went through the gate into the orchard.
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过大门进了果园。

sentences.english: the wrought-iron gates of the palace
sentences.chinese: 宫殿的锻铁大门

detailed_translations.english: the part of a fence or outside wall that you can open and close so that you can enter or leave a place
to provide with a gate or gates

name: appreciate
trans: vt. 欣赏；感激；领会；鉴别

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.english: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.chinese: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.english: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

sentences.english: a politician of rare honesty and courage
sentences.chinese: 具备少见的诚实及勇气的政治家

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being honest

name: honest
trans: adj. 诚实的，实在的；可靠的；坦率的

sentences.english: He was a hard-working, honest man.
sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

sentences.english: Ann had an honest face.
sentences.chinese: 安有一张诚实的面孔。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is honest always tells the truth and does not cheat or steal

name: value
trans: n. 值；价值；价格；重要性；确切涵义

sentences.english: The alterations doubled the value of the house.
sentences.chinese: 经改建后这所房子增值了一倍。

sentences.english: We decided to get the house valued.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定给房子估一估价。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that something is worth
to decide how much money something is worth, by comparing it with similar things

sentences.english: ‘Be prepared’ is the motto of the Boy Scouts.
sentences.chinese: “时刻准备着”是童子军的格言。

detailed_translations.english: a short sentence or phrase giving a rule on how to behave, which expresses the aims or beliefs of a person, school, or institution

trans: n. 信任，信赖；责任；托拉斯
vt. 信任，信赖；盼望；赊卖给

sentences.chinese: 起初，他们之间缺乏信任。

sentences.english: an agreement made on the basis of mutual trust
sentences.chinese: 在相互信任的基础上达成的一项协议

sentences.english: You betrayed your father’s trust (= did something bad even though he trusted you ).
sentences.chinese: 你辜负了你父亲对你的信任。

sentences.english: I just don’t trust him.
sentences.chinese: 我就是不信任他。

sentences.english: The money your father left you will be held in trust until you are 21.
sentences.chinese: 你父亲留给你的钱将被托管到你满21岁。

detailed_translations.english: a strong belief in the honesty, goodness etc of someone or something
to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

sentences.english: the Battle of Trafalgar
sentences.chinese: 特拉法尔加战役

sentences.english: a pitched battle (=  a long and serious battle  ) between police and drug gangs
sentences.chinese: 警方和贩毒团伙之间的一场激战

detailed_translations.english: a fight between opposing armies, groups of ships, groups of people etc, especially one that is part of a larger war

sentences.chinese: 有些人认为宇宙是通过一次大爆炸创造出来的。

sentences.english: Her behaviour is creating a lot of problems.
sentences.chinese: 她的行为引起了很多问题。

sentences.english: The new factory is expected to create more than 400 new jobs.
sentences.chinese: 这家新工厂预计能创造400多个新的就业机会。

sentences.english: The announcement only succeeded in creating confusion.
sentences.chinese: 那通告反而引起了混乱。

detailed_translations.english: to make something exist that did not exist before

sentences.chinese: 她回复了在《纽约时报》上看到的一则求友广告。

detailed_translations.english: an advertisement

sentences.chinese: 我们力求为所有的客户提供物有所值的商品和服务。

sentences.chinese: 我们收到了几封顾客表示满意的来信。

sentences.english: He’s one of our regular customers .
sentences.chinese: 他是我们的一个老主顾。

detailed_translations.english: someone who buys goods or services from a shop, company etc

sentences.english: ‘Lunch? ’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten. ’
sentences.chinese: “午餐？”“不，谢谢，我已吃过了。”

sentences.chinese: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

detailed_translations.english: before now or before a particular time in the pas

sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

trans: adj. 试样的，样品的；作为例子的
vt. 取样；尝试；抽样检查

sentences.chinese: 他们取了血样做肝炎化验。

detailed_translations.chinese: 从…抽样； 品尝， 体验

trans: n. 提议；出价；意图；录取通知书
vi. 提议；出现；献祭；求婚

sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.chinese: 阳光照耀。

sentences.english: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 皓月当空。

detailed_translations.chinese: 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众
detailed_translations.english: to produce bright light

detailed_translations.chinese: 光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计
detailed_translations.english: the brightness that something has when light shines on it

trans: n. 质量，[统计] 品质；特性；才能
adj. 优质的；高品质的；<英俚>棒极了

sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

name: surely
trans: adv. 当然；无疑；坚定地；稳当地

sentences.english: Such sinners will surely be punished.

trans: vi. 成功；继承；继任；兴旺

sentences.chinese: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

sentences.chinese: 我知道这个主意听起来很荒唐，但也许值得一试。

trans: n. 面包师；面包工人；（便携式）烘炉

detailed_translations.chinese: 面包师；面包工人；（便携式）烘炉
detailed_translations.english: someone who bakes bread and cakes, especially in order to sell them in a shop

sentences.english: the world heavyweight boxing champion
sentences.chinese: 世界重量级拳击冠军

sentences.english: the Olympic champion
sentences.chinese: 奥运会冠军

sentences.english: He passionately championed the poor.
sentences.chinese: 他曾热情地捍卫穷人。

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that has won a competition, especially in sport
If you champion a person, a cause, or a principle, you support or defend them

name: relative
trans: n. 亲戚；相关物；[语] 关系词；亲缘植物
adj. 相对的；有关系的；成比例的

sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.english: her opponent’s relative lack of experience
sentences.chinese: 她的对手相对来说缺少经验

sentences.english: You may think you’re poor, but it’s all relative (= you are not poor compared to some people ) .

sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

vi. 拍照；在照片上显得

sentences.chinese: 彩色照片

sentences.english: a black and white photograph
sentences.chinese: 黑白照片

sentences.english: Tim was looking through an old photograph album (= book in which you put photographs ) .
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆在翻看一本旧相册。

sentences.chinese: 你看到报纸上利奥的照片了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a picture obtained by using a camera and film that is sensitive to light

name: lift

n. 电梯；举起；起重机；搭车

sentences.chinese: 铃响了一下苏菲就接起了电话。

sentences.english: He lifted the lid on the pot of soup.
sentences.chinese: 他揭开汤锅的盖子。

sentences.english: The lumber was lifted by crane and dropped into the truck.
sentences.chinese: 木材由起重机搬运到卡车上。

sentences.chinese: 他们乘电梯去楼下的酒吧。

sentences.english: It’s on the 3rd floor. Let’s use the lift.
sentences.chinese: 在三楼，我们乘电梯上去吧。

a machine that you can ride in, that moves up and down between the floors in a tall building

name: weigh
trans: vi. 重量为…；具有重要性；成为…的重荷；起锚

sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

sentences.chinese: 我想要一千克的意大利面。

sentences.chinese: 亚洲人满足他们，将一部分以千克为单位的金条和金手镯空运至瑞士的精炼商，重新把它们加工为400盎司的金条。

detailed_translations.english: a kilogram

sentences.english: I have several suggestions.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个建议。

sentences.english: I have several methods.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个方法。

sentences.english: I have several reasons to support my view.
sentences.chinese: 我有几个理由来支持我的观点。

sentences.chinese: 欧洲第一个重要的文明出现在公元前第二世纪。

sentences.english: Greek playwright back in 500 BC. Many historians consider him the father of Greek tragedies.
sentences.chinese: 公元前500年时的希腊剧作家。许多历史学家认为他是希腊悲剧之父。

sentences.english: The stone monument is believed to be erected near 2500 BC though there is no concrete proof the origin.
sentences.chinese: 尽管没有充分的证据，但人们相信这座石碑在公元前2500左右就被竖立起来了。

detailed_translations.english: (before Christ) used after a date to show that it was before the birth of Christ

name: athlete
trans: n. 运动员，体育家；身强力壮的人

sentences.english: a professional athlete
sentences.chinese: 一位专业运动员

detailed_translations.english: someone who competes in sports competitions, especially running, jumping, and throwing

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

name: married
trans: adj. 已婚的，有配偶的；婚姻的，夫妇的；密切结合的
v. 结婚，与…结婚（marry的过去式）

sentences.chinese: 你是已婚还是单身？

sentences.chinese: 他们已经结婚八年了。

sentences.english: Married men earn 70 percent more than single men.
sentences.chinese: 已婚男子比单身男子多挣70%。

sentences.english: We’re getting married (= marrying ) next month.
sentences.chinese: 我们下个月结婚。

sentences.english: When she first came to London, she was newly married and out of work.
sentences.chinese: 她初到伦敦时刚结婚，而且没有工作。

sentences.english: So, how do you like married life ?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你觉得婚后生活怎么样？

detailed_translations.english: having a husband or a wife

name: host
trans: n. [计] 主机；主人；主持人；许多

sentences.chinese: 哪个国家将主办下一届世界杯？

detailed_translations.english: to provide the place and everything that is needed for an organized event

name: Olympic
trans: adj. 奥林匹斯山的，奥林匹亚的；奥林匹克的

sentences.english: an Olympic gold medal
sentences.chinese: 奥运会金牌

detailed_translations.chinese: 奥林匹斯山的，奥林匹亚的；奥林匹克的
detailed_translations.english: relating to the Olympic Games

name: amazed
trans: v. 使…吃惊；把…弄糊涂（amaze的过去分词）

name: spirit
trans: n. 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒

sentences.english: His spirits were so low (= he was so sad ) that he refused to answer his phone.
sentences.chinese: 他情绪非常低落，连电话也不愿接。

detailed_translations.chinese: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
detailed_translations.english: the qualities that make someone live the way they do, and make them different from other people

name: represent
trans: vt. 代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送

sentences.english: Mr Kobayashi was chosen to represent the company at the conference.
sentences.chinese: 小林先生被选中代表公司出席会议。

detailed_translations.chinese: 作为…的代表， 表示， 象征； 描绘， 表现
detailed_translations.english: to officially speak or take action for another person or group of people

sentences.english: the continents of Asia and Africa
sentences.chinese: 亚洲及非洲大陆

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of land surrounded by sea
able to control your sexual desires

name: America
trans: n. 美洲（包括北美和南美洲）；美国

sentences.english: I may go to America or I may not,it all depends.
sentences.chinese: 我也许去美国，也许不去，要视情况而定。

sentences.english: She scampered in London then went back to America.
sentences.chinese: 她在伦敦匆忙地游览了一番，然后回到了美国。

sentences.english: Some of the mountains in America have not yet been mapped out.
sentences.chinese: 美洲有些山脉还没有在地图上标出来。

name: torch
trans: n. 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物

sentences.english: We shone our torches around the cavern.
sentences.chinese: 我们用手电筒照着山洞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 火把，火炬；手电筒；启发之物
detailed_translations.english: a small electric lamp that you carry in your hand

name: peace
trans: n. 和平；平静；和睦；秩序

sentences.english: The country is at peace with its neighbours for the first time in years.
sentences.chinese: 这是多年来该国与其邻国第一次和平共处。

sentences.chinese: 到那个世纪末，法国和英国议和了。

sentences.english: Her father died suddenly in an accident when she was only ten.

sentences.english: She died peacefully in her sleep at the age of 98.
sentences.chinese: 她在睡眠中安然辞世，享年98岁。

sentences.english: The bullet went straight through his head, and he died instantly.
sentences.chinese: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

sentences.english: Our love will never die.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱始终不渝。

detailed_translations.english: to stop living and become dead

name: dead
trans: adj. 无生命的；呆板的；废弃了的

sentences.english: Her mother had been dead for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.english: Police are trying to contact the family of the dead man.
sentences.chinese: 警方在设法与死者的家属联系。

sentences.english: a pile of dead leaves
sentences.chinese: 一堆枯叶

sentences.english: the dead body of a young soldier
sentences.chinese: 一名年轻士兵的尸体

sentences.english: Two men were shot dead by terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子遭恐怖分子枪杀。

sentences.english: Magnus was found dead in his car.
sentences.chinese: 马格纳斯被人发现死在他自己的车里。

sentences.english: One man is still missing, presumed dead .
sentences.chinese: 仍有一人失踪，被推定已经死亡。

sentences.english: He suddenly had a heart attack and dropped dead .
sentences.chinese: 他突发心脏病猝死。

sentences.english: She was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 到达医院时她被宣告已经死亡。

sentences.english: His fellow climbers had left him for dead on the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 他的登山伙伴以为他已死，便把他留在山上走了。

sentences.english: We didn’t know if she was dead or alive.
sentences.chinese: 我们不知道她是死是活。

sentences.english: When they found him he was more dead than alive .
sentences.chinese: 他们发现他的时候，他已奄奄一息。

sentences.english: Her parents were long dead .
sentences.chinese: 她父母早就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: no longer alive

sentences.english: Seven species of birds of prey have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 已有七种猛禽被观察到。

sentences.english: pandas and other endangered species
sentences.chinese: 熊猫以及其他濒危物种

detailed_translations.english: a group of animals or plants whose members are similar and can breed together to produce young animals or plants

name: respect
trans: n. 尊敬，尊重；方面；敬意

sentences.english: The boys showed a complete lack of respect for authority.
sentences.chinese: 这些男孩子根本无视权威。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of admiring someone or what they do, especially because of their personal qualities, knowledge, or skills
to admire someone because they have high standards and good qualities such as fairness and honesty

name: used
trans: v. 用（use的过去式）；（used to）过去常做
adj. 习惯的；二手的，使用过的

sentences.english: I do the dishes every day, so I’m used to it.
sentences.chinese: 我每天洗盘子，所以习惯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 习惯的；二手的，使用过的
用（use的过去式）；（used to）过去常做

name: divide
trans: n. [地理] 分水岭，分水线
vt. 划分；除；分开；使产生分歧

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

sentences.english: He balanced the plate on the top of a pile of books.
sentences.chinese: 他把盘子在一摞书上放稳。

sentences.english: Ma stacked the cups and piled the plates.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈把杯盘堆叠起来。

detailed_translations.english: a group of several things of the same type that are put on top of each other
to arrange things in a pile

name: seat
trans: vt. 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: keeping the lid on inflation
sentences.chinese: 控制通货膨胀

detailed_translations.english: a cover for the open part of a pot, box, or other container

sentences.english: I’ve got tons of work to do.
sentences.chinese: 我有很多工作要做。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring weight, equal to 2,240 pounds or 1,016 kilograms in Britain, and 2,000 pounds or 907.2 kilograms in the US

name: duty
trans: n. 责任；[税收] 关税；职务

sentences.english: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.english: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.english: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.chinese: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.english: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.chinese: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.english: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
sentences.chinese: 她的道德责任感很强。

sentences.english: Martin’s duties included cleaning the cars.
sentences.chinese: 马丁的职责包括清洗汽车。

sentences.english: the duty on cigarettes
sentences.chinese: 香烟税

detailed_translations.english: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right

name: weather report
trans: na. 气象通报；天气预报

name: neither ... nor ...
trans: 既不……也不；两者都不；均不

name: a field trip
trans: 一次野炊；野外郊游；一次野外旅行

name: one by one
trans: na. 一个一个；一个一个地

sentences.english: Tillicum: I long for freedom, if only for a while.
sentences.chinese: 蒂利克姆：我渴望自由，哪怕只有一段时间。

sentences.english: You have plenty of time to read.
sentences.chinese: 你有大量的时间读书。

sentences.english: The new collections of custom furs around town reveal plenty of folderol, but there are practical things too.
sentences.chinese: 市上大批新的定做的皮衣中有许多是华而不实的， 但也有一些实用的东西。

detailed_translations.chinese: 许多 ；大量； 成百上千

name: turn around
trans: na. 转身；〈美〉使向好的方向转变

sentences.english: Bud turned the truck around, and started back for Dalton Pond.
sentences.chinese: 巴德把卡车调了个头，开始返回道尔顿池塘。

sentences.english: He had reached over to turn around a bottle of champagne so that the label didn't show.
sentences.chinese: 他伸过手把一瓶香槟酒转过去，使它的标签显露不出来。

detailed_translations.english: If you turn something around, or if it turns around, it is moved so that it faces the opposite direction

name: hold on
trans: na. 拉住；继续；坚持下去；(打电话时)不挂断

name: come down
trans: na. 败落；退步；(飞机的)下降

name: not ... until ...
trans: 直到……才；引导的句子要倒装；引起倒装

name: Groundhog Day
trans: n. 【节】圣烛节；土拨鼠日；重现；【影视】偷天情缘

detailed_translations.chinese: 顺便提一下（用于在交谈中插入新话题、题外话或评论）

sentences.english: They waited for an impossible dream to turn real, for a demon to turn into an angel.
sentences.chinese: 他们期望一个不可能的美梦变成现实，期望一个魔鬼能变成天使。

sentences.english: So fat will never turn into muscle.
sentences.chinese: 所以脂肪永远不会变成肌肉。

sentences.english: All of those advantages, for sure.
sentences.chinese: 所有的那些优势，的确。

sentences.english: But one thing is for sure, traveling will be much easier from now on, as I can leave whenever I want without having to juggle rent, the dog, and, well, stuff.
sentences.chinese: 但有一点我确信的是，以后的旅行将会变得更加容易。 因为只要我想，我可以随时启程，我不会再让房租，狗，这种琐事填满我的脑子。

name: have fun doing
trans: 做某事有乐趣；感到做某事很有乐趣；愉快地做某事

name: log onto
trans: 登陆；进入系统；上网和其他的电脑联

name: make sure
trans: na. 尽力做到；深信；务必；务请

sentences.english: I make sure they work well.
sentences.chinese: 我要确认他们做得很好。

sentences.english: And you have to make sure, what I always say.
sentences.chinese: 所以我经常说，你要确保良好的工作环境。

sentences.english: Then, make sure that you and your spouse share these goals with each other.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能具体地说，就是确保你和你的配偶彼此共享这些目标。

name: best of all
trans: un. 起码；充其量；怎么也；最

name: eastern Asia
trans: 东亚；东亚地区；亚洲往往指的是东亚

name: close up
trans: na. 靠紧；(伤)愈合；密闭；〔美国〕结束

name: open up
trans: na. (打)开；割开；开发(资源)；揭示

name: in the middle of
trans: na. 正在…当中；在…的中途；在…的中央；在…的中部

name: at the top of ...
trans: na. 在…最高地位；用最高[最大]的(速度,声音等)

name: look after
trans: na. 照看；照顾；看管；对…负责

sentences.english: I love looking after the children.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢照顾孩子们。

detailed_translations.english: If you look after someone or something, you do what is necessary to keep them healthy, safe, or in good condition

sentences.english: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...
sentences.chinese: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。

sentences.english: This guy should be famous for scoring the first goal of the 2010 World Cup...but it's been overshadowed by the celebration.
sentences.chinese: 这位哥们会因为打进了2010南非世界杯第一个进球而成名。。。。。。但是他的光芒可能被进球庆祝夺走。

name: up to
trans: na. 干(着)；到；胜任；…的责任

sentences.english: Shall we eat out or stay in? It's up to you.
sentences.chinese: 咱们是到外面吃饭还是待在家里？你决定吧。

detailed_translations.english: to be for sb to decide

sentences.english: You probably picked up my keys instead of yours.
sentences.chinese: 你可能没拿你的钥匙而错拿了我的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is not used, does not happen etc, when something else is used, happens etc

name: at the beginning of ...
trans: un. 前奏；处于…的开端；起初

sentences.english: But I'm not for kids putting themselves in danger.
sentences.chinese: 但是我不支持孩子们把自己投入危险中。

name: cut down
trans: na. 砍倒；削减；减价；夺去…活动力

sentences.english: He cut down on coffee and cigarettes, and ate a balanced diet.
sentences.chinese: 他少喝咖啡，少抽烟，饮食均衡。

sentences.english: Car owners were asked to cut down travel.
sentences.chinese: 车主们被要求减少出行。

detailed_translations.english: If you cut down on something or cut down something, you use or do less of it

sentences.english: She can play tennis as well as basketball.
sentences.chinese: 她也会打篮球，也会打网球。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to sb/sth; too

sentences.english: Some of them depend on what your program does.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些取决于您的程序要做什么。

sentences.english: It all depend on whether he like the boss or not.
sentences.chinese: 这完全取决于他是否喜欢这个老闆。

name: pass on
trans: na. “pass away”的变体；递；传达；通过

name: by hand
trans: na. 用手的；用手递交的；(婴儿)用牛奶抚养的

sentences.english: Her coach encouraged her throughout the marathon race to keep on running.
sentences.chinese: 她的教练在马拉松赛全程鼓励她继续不断奔跑。

name: in seconds
trans: 在很短的时间；几秒钟内；短时间

name: far away
trans: adj. 远方的；老早老早以前的；(眼色,神情等)走神的

name: Every coin has two sides.
trans: 事物都有两面性；凡事都有两面性；每个硬币都有两面

name: aside from
trans: na. 暂置不论；加之；除…外

name: take up
trans: na. 拿起；举起；拾起；给搭(火车等)

sentences.english: I know how busy you must be and naturally I wouldn't want to take up too much of your time.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你一定很忙，当然我不想占用你太多的时间。

sentences.english: A good deal of my time is taken up with driving the children to soccer games.
sentences.chinese: 我的许多时间都用在开车送孩子们去参加足球比赛。

detailed_translations.english: If something takes up a particular amount of time, space, or effort, it uses that amount

name: come up to
trans: na. 到达；不亚于；不负(期待)

name: pay for
trans: na. 付开销；赔偿(损失)；(为某种过失)付出代价；吃亏

sentences.english: All this may be the price we pay for progress.
sentences.chinese: 这一切都可能是我们为进步付出的代价。

sentences.english: I'll settle with you, you have to pay for your insulting.
sentences.chinese: 我早晚要找你算这笔账的，你得为你的侮辱行为付出代价。

name: go over to
trans: 过河(或街)到…；经过一段路程到…；改为，改变(信仰、宗教)转到；退出(政党)转向；改变选择；转换

name: I'm afraid I can't afford it.
beef up
trans: <口>加强，补充（人数、兵力）等; 使更大（更好、更有意思等）

name: stand out
trans: na. 突出；显著；不参加战争；抵抗到底

sentences.english: Every tree, wall and fence stood out against dazzling white fields.
sentences.chinese: 每棵树、每堵墙、每道篱笆在白得耀眼的田野的映衬下都很显眼。

detailed_translations.english: If something stands out, it is very noticeable

sentences.english: Spend less than you earn, go without until you have the money.
sentences.chinese: 一定要比自己挣的花的少，如果没有那么多钱，就不要行动。

sentences.english: At this stage, you begin settling for less than what you deserve.
sentences.chinese: 在这个阶段，尽管你得到的比应得的要少，但你还是勉强接受。

sentences.english: When does the wedding come off [take place]?
sentences.chinese: 什么时候举行婚礼?

sentences.english: How many of you believe that there are meetings that take place without you?
sentences.chinese: 你们中多少人相信会有会议,在你们不在场时也会举行？

sentences.english: William and Kate, both 28, have so far revealed only that the wedding will take place in either the spring or summer next year with bookmakers tipping July and August as favorites.
sentences.chinese: 威廉和凯特今年都是28岁。迄今为止，两人只透露说婚礼将在明年春天或夏天举行。博彩公司认为七月或八月结婚的可能性较大。

sentences.english: The party is trying to give the impression that it alone stands for democracy.
sentences.chinese: 该党正企图让人觉得只有它才代表民主。

detailed_translations.english: The ideas or attitudes that someone or something stands for are the ones that they support or represent

name: dream team
trans: n. 梦之队；最佳阵容；最佳组合

name: have an influence on
trans: 影响；对…有影响；影响例句

sentences.english: There were probably about 40 people there in total. ＃
sentences.chinese: 总共可能有40人左右。

name: one third
trans: 是三分之一；三分之一英文是；三分一

name: ring up
trans: v. 在收款机上结算；一段时间内收入或损失的钱；打电话给

sentences.english: I want to ring up my professor.
sentences.chinese: 我想打电话给我的教授。

sentences.english: Did a girl called Gao Hong ring up for me this morning?
sentences.chinese: 今早有个叫高红的女孩给我打电话了吗?

detailed_translations.english: to telephone someone

name: go up
trans: na. 上升；上城市去；腾贵；烧起来

sentences.english: Interest rates went up.
sentences.chinese: 利率上涨了。

sentences.english: The cost has gone up to $1.95 a minute.
sentences.chinese: 价格已涨到了一分钟$1.95。

detailed_translations.english: If a price, amount, or level goes up, it becomes higher or greater than it was

name: in different ways
trans: 以不同的方式；用不同的方法；用不同的方式

sentences.english: And they do not expect just to shake hands with him.
sentences.chinese: 这些领导人期望的不仅仅是和他握握手。

sentences.english: It was love from my mother, and now I could shake hands with others naturally.
sentences.chinese: 那是来自妈妈的爱。 现在，我已经可以很自然地和别人握手了。

name: in recent years
trans: 近年来；最近几年中；在近几年

name: clean up
trans: na. 收拾干净；【机械工程】改正；〔俚语〕赚厚利

sentences.english: Police in the city have been cleaning up the debris left by a day of violent confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 城里的警察一直在收拾一天的暴力冲突留下的残骸。

detailed_translations.english: If you clean up a mess or clean up a place where there is a mess, you make things neat and free of dirt again

name: pick up
trans: v. 拾起；探出；重新开始

sentences.english: She was going over to her parents' house to pick up some clean clothes for Oskar.
sentences.chinese: 她正要去父母家为奥斯卡取几件干净的衣服。

detailed_translations.english: When you pick up someone or something that is waiting to be collected, you go to the place where they are and take them away, often in a car

name: throw away
trans: na. 抛弃；浪费；拒绝(劝告)；失去(机会)

sentences.english: I never throw anything away.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不扔任何东西。

detailed_translations.english: When you throw away or throw out something that you do not want, you get rid of it, for example, by putting it in a rubbish container

name: shut down
trans: na. 关闭；关拢(窗等)；停业；禁止

name: start out
trans: na. 跳出；开始；〔俚语〕企图

name: die off
trans: na. 一个一个死去；顺次枯死
